whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description1: OpenSourceAvatars.com is a registry that helps you discover VRM avatars with clear licensing.
whatWeDo.description2: We aggregate open source 3D avatars from multiple sources - original collections, NFT projects, community creations - and make them easy to find. No more hunting through IPFS gateways, NFT marketplaces, or scattered GitHub repos. We collect the metadata and links so you can focus on creating.

steps: We find VRM avatar collections with open source licenses
We catalog download links, previews, traits, and license info
You filter by license type, style, or collection and download what you need
Files stay where creators hosted them (we only re-host our own avatars)
howItWorks.description: Think of us as a search engine for VRM avatars - making thousands of avatars discoverable in one place.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Amazing VRM avatars are scattered across the web - NFT collections on IPFS, indie creators on GitHub, CC0 projects on random sites. There's no central place to discover them all.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: Aggregate them with transparent licensing. One place to search, clear info on what you can use and how.

mission.title: The Mission
mission.description: Make open source avatars as accessible as free stock photos. Whether you're prototyping a game, building VR worlds, or need a base model for art - we want this to be your first stop.
